info.author: Stefan Gal
info.description:
# COVID-19 REPORTS
*COVID-19 CORONAVIRUS PANDEMIC*

## ABOUT
This library can be used to get actual report for all the countries infected by COVID-19

Reports are for the actual day (daily continuesly updated) or for day before.

Data is retrieved directly from [https://www.worldometers.info/coronavirus/](https://www.worldometers.info/coronavirus/) which is continuesly updated.

Exporting can be done to JSON file, but also you can get as multilevel array.


## USAGE

*Loadin module:*
```python
from covid19 import covid
```

*return Dictionary*
```
covid.getTodayEngine()
```
```bash
{'China': {'Total Cases': '81,285', 'New Cases': '+67', 'Total Deaths': '3,287', 'New Deaths': '+6', 'Total Recovered': '74,051', 'Active Cases': '3,947', 'Serious/Critical': '1,235', 'Tot Cases/1M pop': '56', 'Tot Deaths/1M pop': '2'}, 'Italy': {'Total Cases': '74,386', 'New Cases': '', 'Total Deaths': '7,503', 'New Deaths': '', 'Total Recovered': '9,362', 'Active Cases': '57,521', 'Serious/Critical': '3,489', 'Tot Cases/1M pop': '1,230', 'Tot Deaths/1M pop': '124'}, ...
```

*Example of JSON file:*
```python

covid.todayToJson(filename="today.json", sort=True)
covid.yesterdayToJson(filename="yesterday.json", sort=True)
```

```json
{
    "Afghanistan": {
        "Active Cases": "80",
        "New Cases": "",
        "New Deaths": "",
        "Serious/Critical": "",
        "Tot Cases/1M pop": "2",
        "Tot Deaths/1M pop": "0.05",
        "Total Cases": "84",
        "Total Deaths": "2",
        "Total Recovered": "2"
    },
    "Albania": {
        "Active Cases": "123",
        "New Cases": "",
        "New Deaths": "+1",
        "Serious/Critical": "3",
        "Tot Cases/1M pop": "51",
        "Tot Deaths/1M pop": "2",
        "Total Cases": "146",
        "Total Deaths": "6",
        "Total Recovered": "17"
    },
```

*For summary:*
```python
covid.getSummary()
```

```python
{'Positive': '486,592', 'Deaths': '22,020', 'Recovered': '117,446'}
```

*For country:*
```python
covid.getTodayCountry(['slov'])
```
...results for Slovenia, Slovakia:
```python
{'Slovenia': {'Total Cases': '528', 'New Cases': '', 'Total Deaths': '5', 'New Deaths': '', 'Total Recovered': '10', 'Active Cases': '513', 'Serious/Critical': '14', 'Tot Cases/1M pop': '254', 'Tot Deaths/1M pop': '2'}, 'Slovakia': {'Total Cases': '226', 'New Cases': '+10', 'Total Deaths': '', 'New Deaths': '', 'Total Recovered': '7', 'Active Cases': '219', 'Serious/Critical': '2', 'Tot Cases/1M pop': '41', 'Tot Deaths/1M pop': ''}}
```
or
```python
covid.getTodayCountry(['slov', 'Vietnam', 'hun'])
```
...results for Slovenia, Slovakia, Vietnam, Hungary:
```python
{'Slovenia': {'Total Cases': '528', 'New Cases': '', 'Total Deaths': '5', 'New Deaths': '', 'Total Recovered': '10', 'Active Cases': '513', 'Serious/Critical': '14', 'Tot Cases/1M pop': '254', 'Tot Deaths/1M pop': '2'}, 'Slovakia': {'Total Cases': '226', 'New Cases': '+10', 'Total Deaths': '', 'New Deaths': '', 'Total Recovered': '2', 'Active Cases': '224', 'Serious/Critical': '2', 'Tot Cases/1M pop': '41', 'Tot Deaths/1M pop': ''}, 'Vietnam': {'Total Cases': '153', 'New Cases': '+5', 'Total Deaths': '', 'New Deaths': '', 'Total Recovered': '17', 'Active Cases': '136', 'Serious/Critical': '3', 'Tot Cases/1M pop': '2', 'Tot Deaths/1M pop': ''}, 'Hungary': {'Total Cases': '261', 'New Cases': '+35', 'Total Deaths': '10', 'New Deaths': '', 'Total Recovered': '28', 'Active Cases': '223', 'Serious/Critical': '6', 'Tot Cases/1M pop': '27', 'Tot Deaths/1M pop': '1'}}
```
## Installation

```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

<sup>
Thank you for using. Contributions of any kind welcome!
</sup>

:smirk:
